work_to_be_done: Photos are implemented in an atypical fashion in iDig; better naming needed

fields.name: Source
fields.title: Trench
fields.description: The name of the trench from which this sample was taken.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.title: Sample Number
fields.description: Sample number is a sequential number assigned per context at the time the sample is taken.

fields.name: FileNames
fields.title: FileNames
fields.description: Used when a photo taken outside iPad is linked to context

fields.name: Title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: A short tile for the photograph.

fields.name: DateEarliest
fields.title: DateTimeStamp
fields.description: A datetime stamp set when the sample record was created.

fields.name: RelationAttachments
fields.title: RelationAttachments
fields.description: A serialized strinng field with image name and datetimestamp.

fields.name: DateModified
fields.title: DateModified
fields.description: A datetime stamp for when record was last modified.

fields.name: DateTimeZone
fields.title: DateTimeZone
fields.description: Names the time zone in which the record was created (and/or nodified??).

fields.name: FormatImage
fields.title: ImageFileName
fields.description: Filename made up of an UUID with the suffix .jpg

fields.name: IdentifierUUID
fields.title: IdentifierUUID
fields.description: A globally unique identifier set outside iDig.

fields.name: RelationBelongsTo
fields.title: RelationBelongsTo
fields.description: In iDig you can say a sample belongs to another or multiple other things.

fields.name: RelationBelongsToUUID
fields.title: RelationBelongsToUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the item(s) to which this sample belongs.

fields.name: RelationIncludes
fields.title: RelationIncludes
fields.description: In iDig a sample can include another or multiple other things (e.g. photographs)

fields.name: RelationIncludesUUID
fields.title: RelationIncludesUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier(s) of the item(s) included in this sample record.

fields.name: iDigIdentifierUUID
fields.title: iDigIdentifierUUID
fields.description: The globablly unique identifier set by iDig.
